tool.name: Perforce
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for interacting with the Perforce source code management system.

cvar.name: P4COM
cvar.summary: The command line used to fetch source files from Perforce.

cvar.name: P4COMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when fetching a source file from Perforce. If this is not set, then &cv-link-P4COM; (the command line) is displayed.

cvar.name: P4FLAGS
cvar.summary: General options that are passed to Perforce.
